title: #83: Into The Microcosm | Jimmy Gene
description:
Jimmy Gene has been deep down the rabbit hole for a very long time due to his extensive knowledge of how the technology of broadcasting works, how it can be compromised, and who is doing it.

As the host of the wildly popular and very trippy show “Into The Microcosm” on Revolution Radio, Jimmy Gene stops by to explain how this digital prison is being built around us and how we can break free.

Get ready for a wild ride with one of the OGs of the conspiracy world, and a man with decades of experience sorting out the insanity.

Controlled Demolition on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08M21XKJ5
